now the great thing with cooking and
parchment is that you don't need any
other fastener other than just the paper
and the folds just snugly pleat all the
way around and this way it keeps all of
the moisture and then all the flavors in
the packet so you know you're gonna have
a really flavorful healthy meal and as
you're coming around to the end just
tuck the final pleat underneath to seal
and transfer it to a rimmed baking sheet
these are gonna bake at 425 for about 20
to 20
